__ with h/o HTN, and stent in RCA here with acute onset of mid-back and abdominal pain that started a few hours prior to admission. C/O difficulties breathing ___ pain. Seen at ___ ED and CT scan showed Type B dissection. BP was elevated at 180's and pt given labetolol. Also given full dose ___.

Patient currently stable on arrival to ___. Recieved morphine in ED and currently denies back or abdominal pain. No extremity pain. No headaches.
